pkgmetadata.longdescription: Liferea is a news aggregator for RDF/RSS/CDF/Atom/Echo/etc feeds. It's based on gnome and xulrunner/webkit.

use.flag: Enables the DBUS connector for liferea, so feeds can be managed from external programs
Uses the gtkhtml rendering engine for item rendering. Deprecated, and broken on amd64.
Enable NetworkManager integration to automatically detect online/offline status
Enable the webkit rendering engine for item rendering
